Vineland.Cumberland County Technology Education C:
Cumberland County Technology Education Center is a four-year vocational public high school located in Vineland that serves students in ninth through twelfth grades from across Cumberland County, New Jersey, United States, operating as part of the Cumberland County Vocational School District.
As of the 2014-15 school year, the school had an enrollment of 55 students and 27.9 classroom teachers (on an FTE basis), for a student–teacher ratio of 2.0:1. There were 31 students (56.4% of enrollment) eligible for free lunch and 3 (5.5% of students) eligible for reduced-cost lunch.
